data.title: Berkeley Preparatory Academy - Summerville
data.meta_description: Berkeley Preparatory Academy is a public school in Summerville, South Carolina that is part of South Carolina Department of Education. It serves 546 studentsin K - 6 .Its teachers have had one project funded on DonorsChoose.
data.text:
About this school

Berkeley Preparatory Academy is a rural public school in Summerville, South Carolina that is part of South Carolina Department of Education. It serves 546 students in K - 6 . Its teachers have had one project funded on DonorsChoose.

Grades Served

K - 6

Students

546

Teachers

Not available

Berkeley Preparatory Academy Contact info is sourced from our partners at MDR Education, and DonorsChoose updates our site ahead of each school year.

(843) 832-7921

122 Bee Tree Blvd

Summerville, SC 29486

Website

DonorsChoose is the most trusted classroom funding site for teachers.

As a teacher-founded nonprofit, we're trusted by thousands of teachers and supporters across the country. Each classroom request for funding was created by a classroom teacher and reviewed by the DonorsChoose team.

See how DonorsChoose works

Berkeley Preparatory Academy Support on DonorsChoose Last updated Aug 14, 2024

DonorsChoose makes it easy for anyone to help a teacher in need, moving us closer to a nation where students in every community have the tools and experiences they need for a great education.
